div.p: Lessons Learnt from Comparing WhatsApp Privacy Concerns Across Saudi and Indian Populations

Multimedia messaging application for texting, sharing data, and calling
Origin is a factor in influencing privacy

RQ1: Origin affects privacy concerns and consequently, privacy behavior
RQ2: Gender affects certain privacy concerns, but affects privacy behavior differently in Saudi Arabia and India
RQ3: Most participants in both populations wanted to be able to control the content and recipient (with a greater focus on recipients) of their shared information
Human Aspects of Technical Security (HATS) Lab Luddy School of Informatics, Computing, and Engineering
